Class Structure

java.lang.Object
  BeamCalc.Structure

public class Structure
extends java.lang.Object

The class Structure contains is the main class in the library. All other classes refer to this class, or are called by this class.

addBeam

public void addBeam(processing.core.PVector pt1,
                    processing.core.PVector pt2,
                    int aMode,
                    int bMode,
                    processing.core.PVector planeVec)
This is the routine to add an element. The other nodes in the structure are checked to avoid node duplication The degrees of freedom are defined from the calling function
